panels.description:
Node states breakdown:
- **Down**: Nodes not operational (DOWN or ERROR states)
- **Drained**: IDLE nodes with DRAIN flag
- **Draining**: Nodes with DRAIN flag running jobs
- **Busy**: Nodes running jobs normally (ALLOCATED or MIXED)
- **Idle**: Nodes ready and available to accept new jobs
- **Maintenance**: Nodes temporarily unavailable for administrative tasks
panels.title: Nodes by State

panels.description: Timeline of node problems showing Down (DOWN/ERROR states), Drained (IDLE with drain), and Draining (ALLOCATED/MIXED with drain) states. Maintenance nodes are filtered out.

targets.expr:
with (
  node_fails = sum by (node_name) (
      # Down: Nodes in DOWN or ERROR state (not in maintenance)
      count by (node_name) (slurm_node_info{state_base=~"DOWN|ERROR", state_is_maintenance!="true", node_name=~"$node_name", }) * 1 or
      # Drained: IDLE nodes with drain flag (not in maintenance)
      count by (node_name) (slurm_node_info{state_base="IDLE", state_is_drain="true", state_is_maintenance!="true", node_name=~"$node_name", }) * 2 or
      # Draining: ALLOCATED/MIXED nodes with drain flag (not in maintenance)
      count by (node_name) (slurm_node_info{state_base=~"ALLOCATED|MIXED", state_is_drain="true", state_is_maintenance!="true", node_name=~"$node_name", }) * 3
    )
)
node_fails
or
(
  # To show recovery as IDLE without drain state after failure
  count by (node_name) (slurm_node_info{state_base=~"IDLE", state_is_drain="false", state_is_maintenance!="true", node_name=~"$node_name", }) * 4
  and
  min_over_time(node_fails[15m:1m]) > 0
)

panels.title: Node Problems Timeline

panels.title: Node Draining Time

panels.description:
Lists nodes that are DOWN, in ERROR state, or have DRAIN flag set (maintenance nodes excluded).

**Columns:**
- Fail Reason: From failure counter metrics
- State Reason: From node info (Soperator 1.22+)

**Note:** Rows group events by state - same node may appear multiple times with overlapping time ranges.
panels.title: Node Problems Breakdown

panels.title: Job Size

panels.description:
% of workers that where not drawing much power when job was in `RUNNING` state

only jobs with `>=70%` under-utilized workers for more than `20m` are shown

targets.expr:
floor(
    avg_over_time(
  (
    (
      (
        round((count(DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{hpc_job!=""} > 2) by(hpc_job) / 8) > 2)
          -
        round(
          (count(DCGM_FI_DEV_POWER_USAGE{hpc_job!=""} > 120) by(hpc_job) / 8)
            >
          2
        )
      )
        /
      round((count(DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{hpc_job!="", } > 2) by(hpc_job) / 8) > 2)
    )
      *
    100
  )[1h:1m]
) >=  70
)
  and on(hpc_job)
label_move(slurm_job_info{job_state="RUNNING"}, 'job_id', 'hpc_job')
and on (hpc_job)
count_over_time( #filter out short durations
avg_over_time((
  (
    (
      (
        round((count(DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{hpc_job!=""} > 2) by(hpc_job) / 8) > 2)
          -
        round(
          (count(DCGM_FI_DEV_POWER_USAGE{hpc_job!=""} > 120) by(hpc_job) / 8)
            >
          2
        )
      )
        /
      round((count(DCGM_FI_DEV_FB_USED{hpc_job!=""} > 2) by(hpc_job) / 8) > 2)
    )
      *
    100
  )[1h:1m]
) > 70
  and on(hpc_job)
label_move(slurm_job_info{job_state="RUNNING"}, 'job_id', 'hpc_job')
)[1h:1m]
) > 20

panels.description: Paginated

targets.expr:
with (
    filters = {slurm_partition${partition_match_exp}},
)
sum by (job_id,)(
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="PENDING", filters}) * 1 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="CONFIGURING",filters}) * 2 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="RUNNING", filters}) * 3 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="COMPLETING", filters}) * 4 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="COMPLETED", filters}) * 5 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="CANCELLED", filters}) * 6 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="FAILED", filters}) * 7 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="TIMEOUT", filters}) * 8 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="PREEMPTED", filters}) * 9 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="NODE_FAIL", filters}) * 10 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="BOOT_FAIL", filters}) * 11 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="DEADLINE", filters}) * 12 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="OUT_OF_MEMORY", filters}) * 13 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="REQUEUED", filters}) * 14 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="RESIZING", filters}) * 15 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="SUSPENDED", filters}) * 16 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="STOPPED", filters}) * 17 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="POWER_UP_NODE", filters}) * 18 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="SIGNALING", filters}) * 19 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="STAGE_OUT", filters}) * 20 or
  count by (job_id, job_name) (slurm_job_info{job_state="UPDATE_DB", filters}) * 21
)
